module.label: Show Objects Group
module.description: This Module allows you to create a form or a table based in a specific objects group data (list or item)... This modules should be used to create settings or other objects that can have their properties json encoded. Example: If you wish to allow the client to show and edit a banner, you can use this module by creating the correspondent form and json-encoding the banner properties (like width, height, border, color, link url, etc...)
